name: Emoji Evolution
description:
Emoji Evolution is a new look at the alchemy game where you have to combine different elements to find a new one. Find all recipes and solve the main dilemma of humanity - what will happen in the end!

At the start, you have only the 4 base elements - soil, water, fire, and air. Combine these you will invent different blueprints which will help you to open more new ones.

Use your logical skills to predict further steps to solve the puzzle and invent impressive chains. Be witty, there are a lot of gags and jokes cause this is the Emoji world and something works not exactly as in real life.
